data.actual_result: The search appears there and even if you have no bans
data.expected_result: The search shouldn't show in other sections of server settings
data.short_description: If you search for something in the members section in server settings, the same search appears in bans, when you haven't searched any bans and don't have any
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that doesn't have bans - Open server settings - Go to members - Search for something and press return - Press back - Go to the bans section - Observe how the search bar is now there even though you have no bans and it's your previous search there
